thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com | 3 of 105
thread.title: Geoff Winters

author: Geoff Winters
title: Geoff Winters
text: Using OFX to transfer funds abroad is a very simple process. Once you have struck a deal at a very competitive rate, the process to pay in the necessary funds and OFX getting the currency into your account abroad is very quick. The speed of transfer has improved markedly recently due to the banking rapid payment system. I cannot fault OFX and would recommend them without hesitation.
